title: “We are saving the world”
author: VD
content_html:
It doesn’t get much more clear than this:

REPORTER: QAnon believes you are secretly saving the world from this cult of pedophiles and cannibals. Are you behind that?

PRESIDENT TRUMP: Is that supposed to be a bad thing? We are, actually. We are saving the world.
content_text:
It doesn’t get much more clear than this:
REPORTER:
QAnon believes you are secretly saving the world from this cult of pedophiles and cannibals. Are you behind that?
PRESIDENT TRUMP:
Is that supposed to be a bad thing? We are, actually. We are saving the world.
